text: Carrie Underwood opened Super Bowl 52 on Feb. 4 with the premiere of her new video for “ The Champion, ” a tune she co - wrote with Brett James, Chris DeStefano and Ludacris, whose vocals are also featured on the song. “ When we were writing ‘ The Champion, ’ our main focus was to celebrate athletes at the top of their game, but we also wanted the song to resonate with people in their everyday lives, ” says Carrie. “ We hope the lyrics will inspire people to push themselves beyond their limits to conquer anything they are trying to accomplish or overcome.
